snippet: President Obama seems happy to debate his Republican critics about an Afghanistan withdrawal timetable that is politically popular.
abstract: Mitt Romney says Obama administration's latest plan to pull American troops out of Afghanistan by mid-2013 is 'naive' and 'misguided;' President Obama seems happy to debate his Republican critics about an Afghanistan withdrawal timetable that is politically popular.

byline.original: By MARK LANDLER and HELENE COOPER

lead_paragraph: President Obama seems happy to debate his Republican critics about an Afghanistan withdrawal timetable that is politically popular.

headline.seo: Obama Glad to Debate Romney on Afghanistan Pullout
headline.main: Romney Criticizes Afghan Pullout Plan, but Obama Is Eager for the Debate
headline.print_headline: Romney Criticizes Afghan Pullout Plan, but Obama Is Eager for the Debate

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: United States Defense and Military Forces
